lines: Tu la yaka a bbwe lipona, Jesu ndi Bbwe lya kale;
Eli liyumu kwiÕma ali ndilyo, No lu ungisya luwo
Eli Bbwe eli Bbwe tu la yaka a Bbwe, Tu yaka a Bbwe
Eli Liyumu Klistu ndii Bbwe lyesu.
Bamwi ba yaka a musenga, Alubono lwa mu nyika;
Bamwi ba yaka mumapenzi mu mpuwo ya mu nyika.
Mu yake a bbwe li tamani Jesu, Ndii Bbwe litaanzi,
